data.text:
Summary
Completed a first dry run test and feedback session for the PhotoSharing sample app.  Provided feedback on improving documentation and first time experience for the end user which is currently being worked on.  Currently working on moving the project into a dedicated and repo.  Appsec review has also been kicked off.  Goal is to complete and launch the sample app before Rui leaves the team on June 11.
